com.alexvasilkov.android.commons.state

类 InstanceStateManager<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexvasilkov.android.commons.state.InstanceStateManager<T>

  • public class InstanceStateManager<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Helps saving and restoring Activity or Fragment instance state.
    Only local fields marked with InstanceState annotation will be saved.
    Supported fields types: boolean, boolean[], byte, byte[], char, char[], CharSequence, CharSequence[], double, double[], float, float[], int, int[], long, long[], short, short[], String, String[], Bundle and all objects implementing Serializable.
    See also saveInstanceState(Object, android.os.Bundle) and restoreInstanceState(Object, android.os.Bundle) methods.

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static <T> void restoreInstanceState(T obj, android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Restoring instance state from given savedInstanceState into the given obj.
      static <T> android.os.Bundle saveInstanceState(T obj, android.os.Bundle outState)
      Saving instance state of the given obj into outState.

    • 方法详细资料

      • saveInstanceState

        public static <T> android.os.Bundle saveInstanceState(T obj,
                                                      android.os.Bundle outState)
        Saving instance state of the given obj into outState.
        Supposed to be called from Activity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle) or Fragment.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle).
        Activity or Fragment itself can be used as obj parameter.

      • restoreInstanceState

        public static <T> void restoreInstanceState(T obj,
                                            android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Restoring instance state from given savedInstanceState into the given obj.
        Supposed to be called from Activity.onCreate(android.os.Bundle) or Fragment.onCreate(android.os.Bundle) prior to using of local fields marked with InstanceState annotation.
